semantics.name: Set Union
semantics.description: The union of two sets A and B is the set of elements which are in A, in B, or in both
semantics.searchText: set union the union of two sets a and b is the set of elements which are in a, in b, or in both set theory operations union join

semantics.name: Set Intersection
semantics.description: The intersection of two sets A and B is the set of elements which are in both A and B
